tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: Very good doctor. I have met he for my wife. She is very understanding . She gets to the core of the problem and diagonises it. The clinic is located in a prominent location.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Doctors are very friendly *** ************* * Got satisfactory explanation of each and every small queries. She also has a wonderful team with all the women power and state of art clinic. Overall I am recommending her because you can get the best advice from her with a smile.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We had called before starting from home. The receptionist said she is there you can come. When we reached she wasn't there and we waited for an hr. Then some nurse came to see. We said we want Dr. Namrata only so they said you ll need to wait for an hr more better show it to the nurse. We waited for Dr.Namrata for another hr. When she finally came *** ***** **** **** ** **** ** *** ***** ** ********** Just wrote medicines. When asked how many days for this severe pain to go she couldn't reply. Bad experience

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Very bad experience..doctor did not provided the prescription..as I have not done test at their center.Charges are huge...for blood test charges is 3k..

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: I took my cousin sister to this doctor for her pregnancy check ups every month. My sister was extremely satisfied with the treatment provided to her. Though she had some complications but because of doctor now she is enjoying her motherhood and is a mother of a cute little baby boy. Hope this information is helpful for others as well. Thank you!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Had bleeding  issue during  initial time of my pregnancy and the  doctors  whom I have  visited  earlier didn't  deal with  the issue properly. Than one of my friend recommended  Dr Namrata  she has always  been there  whenever  needed. She has guided me through out my labor so that I can have  a normal pregnancy. I'm thankful to Dr Namrata and I would  recommend  her to all my friends and family

review: Very good doctor. Showed an hope to us for the future. Certainly be recommended for others. *** ****** *** **** ********* ***** *** *** *********

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: She is friendly and treats well. She has nice  team of workers. Clinic set up is good.Even i have taken one of my friend for check up. She was 3 months pregnant. She is happy with doctors treatment n nice behaviour.

review: Doctor is very empathetic.  She treats her patients in a very friendly manner along with description of the problem,  symptoms,  prevention and remedial measures.
